casebody.data:
James J. BAKER
v.
Lisa WHITNUM-BAKER. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 8, 2016.

Lisa Whitnum-Baker, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Tara C. Dugo, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 161 Conn.App. 227, 127 A.3d 330 (2015), is denied.
